name: Kohlrabi and Celery Root Purée
description: This simple combination tastes so good to me, it hardly needs embellishment. The butter is optional. If you miss old-fashioned buttery mashed potatoes, let this be a stand-in.
keywords: celery root, kohlrabi, potato, gluten-free, healthy, low-fat, low-sodium, nut-free, vegetarian, side dish, winter
recipeIngredient: 1/4 pound Yukon gold potatoes (1 medium), peeled and diced
1 pound kohlrabi, peeled and cut into large pieces
1 large celery root, about 1 pound, peeled and cut into large pieces
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place the potatoes, kohlrabi and celery root in a steamer above 2 inches of boiling water. Cover and steam 15 to 20 minutes, until tender.

Drain, cover tightly and allow to sit for 5 minutes, to steam and dry out. Mash with a potato masher or through a food mill fitted with a medium screen. Add the yogurt and the butter and mix together until incorporated. Season to taste with salt and pepper.
